violations: Missing PPE: Some workers not wearing hard hats or high-visibility vests.
Workers in dangerous positions: Workers standing close to suspended load.
Improper equipment usage: Load suspended without visible safety barriers.
locations: Central area under the suspended coil.
Area near the entrance with multiple workers.
recommendations: Ensure all workers wear appropriate PPE including hard hats and vests.
Keep a safe distance from suspended loads and use barriers around lifting areas.
Use clear demarcations and safety barriers around areas with heavy machinery.
worker_positions: One worker on the left adjusting coils.
Two workers directly under the suspended coil.
Three workers near the entrance of the warehouse.

worker_identifiers.features: Worker without a helmet, close to the suspended load.
Worker without a vest, near the entrance.
Worker adjusting coils on the left without a helmet.
